description: Now 10-0 lifetime, the Ninja continues her winning ways. This week, going up two weight classes she defeats newcomer Vendetta. Vendetta was no pushover for her first match ever. The Ninja only won by a margin of 118 points and that is not a lot points here at US. Look for Vendetta to improve and be a contender here at US. Until then, enjoy how the Ninja fucks the shit out of Vendetta in round 4; I have the feeling that Vendetta will not be on the receiving end for long.
title: Ninja (5-0) vs. Vendetta (0-0)
